name: Twelve Dancing Cards
description:
All events hosted by the Fae of Grimm tend to go awry in some way or another.

For this reason, you have been invited to join the twelve princesses at tonight’s dance and assist with filling out their dance cards. 

Specific songs and styles of dance are never established before the moment that each dance begins. That is simply the way such nights unfold. The princesses are used to it by now.

Begin by preparing the twelve dance cards: you may choose to go with the included template or create and design your own unique cards to fit the needs of each princess. 

Take care to hide your worn out shoes upon returning home.

Enjoy the night.
